snippet: Poland threatened to halt the transfer of al Qaeda suspects to a secret CIA jail on its soil 11 years ago, but became more "flexible" after the Central Intelligence Agency gave it a large sum of money, according to a U.S. Senate report....

headline.print_headline: CIA Paid Poland to Ease Qualms Over Secret Prison: Senate Report
headline.main: CIA Paid Poland to Ease Qualms Over Secret Prison: Senate Report

lead_paragraph: Poland threatened to halt the transfer of al Qaeda suspects to a secret CIA jail on its soil 11 years ago, but became more "flexible" after the Central Intelligence Agency gave it a large sum of money, according to a U.S. Senate report.
